topic: Strengthen the Female Mind by Enlarging it and there will be an End to Blind Obedience

strengths: Clear Roman numeral structure with subpoints spanning multiple pages
Includes introduction, main arguments, impediments, measures, and conclusion

outline_sections.title: I. Introduction
outline_sections.notes: Short paragraph on reality of female education ending blind obedience and need for policies

outline_sections.title: II. How strengthening the female mind by enlarging it with education Godsends blind obedience:
outline_sections.notes: Subpoints 1-3 on breaking patriarchal shackles, economic independence, knowing rights

outline_sections.title: II. (continued)
outline_sections.notes: Subpoints 4-5 on immunity to customs and political participation

outline_sections.title: III. Impediments in the way of enlarging female mind with education
outline_sections.notes: Subpoints 1-4 on societal barriers, economic dependence, child marriages, government provisions

outline_sections.title: III. (continued)
outline_sections.notes: Subpoints 5-6 on digital divide and lack of security

outline_sections.title: IV. Measures required to eliminate these impediment in way of women education.
outline_sections.notes: Subpoints 1-5 on attitudinal change, skill development, ban on early marriage, digital divide mitigation, enforce laws

outline_sections.title: 3. In Pakistan, ensure implementation of Article 25, and Article 38

overall_flow_comment: Essay closely follows outline structure from intro through body arguments, impediments, measures, to conclusion.
